text: He muminasakala! Tomaloke allahara anugatya karaa arau raachulara anugatya karaa lagate anugatya karaa tomalokara majara ksamatasilasakalara, tara pichata tomalokara majata kono bisaya lai matabheda ghatile seya upasthapana karaa allaha arau te'omra raachulara ocarata, yadi tomaloke allaha arau akhiraataka bisbasa karaa. E'i pantha'i uttama arau parainamata prakrstatara
